start.speaker: Noma
start.text:
The Hollow City forgets on purpose. Someone has to remember on purpose too.

I don’t collect secrets. I catalogue responsibilities.

choices.text: Then travel with me. We’ll carry what we must.
I’m not sure I want more responsibility.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: Noma’s satchel is heavy with paper and intent. She walks as if words have weight—and she knows exactly how much.
